description: Restores a namespace from a snapshot.

parameters.name: namespaceName
parameters.description: The name of the namespace to restore the snapshot to.

parameters.name: snapshotArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the snapshot to restore from. Required if restoring from a provisioned cluster to Amazon Redshift Serverless. Must not be specified at the same time as snapshotName. The format of the ARN is arn:aws:redshift:<region>:<account_id>:snapshot:<cluster_identifier>/<snapshot_identifier>.

parameters.name: workgroupName
parameters.description: The name of the workgroup used to restore the snapshot.

nested_items.name: namespace
nested_items.description: A collection of database objects and users.

nested_items.name: adminPasswordSecretArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the namespace's admin user credentials secret.

nested_items.name: adminPasswordSecretKmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Key Management Service (KMS) key used to encrypt and store the namespace's admin credentials secret.

nested_items.name: adminUsername
nested_items.description: The username of the administrator for the first database created in the namespace.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date of when the namespace was created.

nested_items.name: dbName
nested_items.description: The name of the first database created in the namespace.

nested_items.name: defaultIamRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role to set as a default in the namespace.

nested_items.name: iamRoles
nested_items.description: A list of IAM roles to associate with the namespace.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services Key Management Service key used to encrypt your data.

nested_items.name: logExports
nested_items.description: The types of logs the namespace can export. Available export types are User log, Connection log, and User activity log.

nested_items.name: namespaceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) associated with a namespace.

nested_items.name: namespaceId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of a namespace.

nested_items.name: namespaceName
nested_items.description: The name of the namespace. Must be between 3-64 alphanumeric characters in lowercase, and it cannot be a reserved word. A list of reserved words can be found in Reserved Words in the Amazon Redshift Database Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: ownerAccount
nested_items.description: The owner Amazon Web Services; account of the snapshot that was restored.

nested_items.name: snapshotName
nested_items.description: The name of the snapshot used to restore the namespace.
